title: Thunderbird causing blue screen crash if I try to delete nstmp folders
creator: flamingobarpattaya
content:
Excuse my basic tech knowledge....

Thunderbird is clogging up my drive with over 200gb of files and now I am getting constant messages about not being able to get emails because of a lack of disk space.

My xul.dll file is 121 GB and my omni.ja file is 80 GB.

I have multiple nstmp folders (x15 at last count) that seem to be the problem.

Every time I try to delete them though, I am getting a blue screen computer crash...... even in safe mode.

How can I delete those files manually?

If I reinstall Thunderbird, won't it just keep all my files/folders which won't solve my problem?

title: Thunderbird issue for access office 365 email message "Server outlook.office365.com has disconnected. The server may have gone down or there may be a network problem"

content:
I am new to thunderbird as stated other post. Thank you for all of you helping me. This is really a great program.

I am getting a office 365 error.

Server outlook.office365.com has disconnected. The server may have gone down or there may be a network problem

I have already tried the "network.dns.disableIPv6 = true)" Fix but it does not work.

I am thinking this is a new error. I have the latest version of Thunderbird. Thunderbird Updates Version 115.9.0 (64-bit)

Please help me fellow thunderbird users. I see many messages and fixes but the ipv6 does not work.

title: Archive empty in TB but files exist
creator: pfl2
content: Ubuntu 18.04.6 LTS and Thunderbird 102.11.0 (64bit) Archives in TB show 2021 and 2024 only but both are empty Archives.sbd contains 4 files: 1) 2021 (empty), 2) 2021.msf, 3) 2024 (apparently all missing emails are dumped here, but not in clear readable format) and 4) 2024.msf I did not intentionally archive the files; could be by accident clicking "A" but unlikely that I accidentally also had selected app. 3,000 emails. App. 60 mails were left (i.e. not archived) in inbox Tried to archive one file afterwards from inbox. OK, went correct to 2024 in the same folder as all the others. However, this mail was visible in Archives, 2024 in TB. I moved it back to inbox without any problem but strangely it still also is in Archives.sbd, 2024! HOW CAN I GET THE EMAILS (app. 3,000) FROM Archives.sbd, 2024 BACK TO TB?
metadata: ;category:other;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Ubuntu; Linux x86_64; rv:109.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/113.0;product:thunderbird;solver_id:5881115

title: Snoozed folder in gmail not showing with IMAP
creator: st.guadagno
content:
Hello, I am Italian but I write in English because I do not know who will read the forum. As per my subject, I have a problem with the "Snoozed" folder of gmail for only one account, the others work. The account is configured in IMAP, from gmail settings the postponed folder is active (Show in IMAP). But from Thunderbird, when I choose which folders to subscribe to, the "Snoozed" folder doesn't show up at all. Why is that? What am I doing wrong? It's my main work account, so I need to snooze emails from my phone when I'm on the go, and then retrieve them later from my laptop. Thank you!

Come da oggetto, ho un problema con la cartella "Posticipati" di gmail per un account solo, gli altri funzionano. L'account è configurato in IMAP, dalle impostazioni di gmail la cartella posticipati è attiva (mostra in IMAP). Ma da Thunderbird, quando scelgo quali cartelle sottoscrivere, quella "Posticipati" non compare proprio, in nessun modo. Perché? Cosa sto sbagliando? E' il mio principale account di lavoro, per cui mi serve posticipare le mail dal telefono quando sono in giro, per poi recuperarle dopo dal portatile.

title: email problems
creator: L.Reich
content:
Having changed my email address with my client, I need to get rid of the old one and its connections from my laptop as it keeps popping up and creating error messages.

I am told by my client that they are stuck, since when they go to the menu "account settings" the only settings they can access are for the new email address. When they try "preferences/privacy/security/passwords" the old password is not found.

How do I get to the settings of the obsolete address in order to delete ?

I hope you can help

Leslie Reich

title: Email Forwarding
creator: post419
content:
This is a new problem which has only just started. If I open up an email and press the Forward button to forward the message on, the original content of the email including attachments is lost. The only part of the original message that remains is the Subject, Date, From and To section. The same occurs if I right click the email from the Inbox and click on Forward.

The problem does appear to be intermittent and is not affecting all emails.

Is this a known problem, can anyone assist in a resolution?

Many thanks

title: HTML in message window
creator: tim284
content:
Occasionally I will see a set of Email messages that look exactly like the one in the attachment in the message body window. When I look at them on another client, they are fine, so I think they get downloaded to my Thunderbird incorrectly. I have about 10 or 12 messages that look like this (no change at all between messages).

Two questions:

1. Is this a problem others see (I only get it once in a while, both in the beta that I stopped using and in the current version).

2. When this does happen to me, what can I do to refresh these messages? I have not found anything in any of the menus that looks like it would help. I have cleared cache.

Thank you.

title: Thunderbird installed and started working with my Xfinity account, then stopped
creator: robert-shuman
content:
Dear Thunderbird Support,

I installed Thunderbird and added my xfinity email account. All worked fine for half a day, then it stopped connecting while downloading a folder of files and hasn't reconnected since. The "extra" pop up window where the first time I logged into Xfinity and then used the Xfinity App for 2FA and it worked fine, now opens a window and starts with a long URL, then after approx 10 sec replaces that long url with a localhost one and the page says "Unable to connect, An error occurred during a connection to localhost."

Can't seem to get past this now. Restarted the program then restarted my Windows 10 PC, same unfortunate result. I'm afraid to remove the account because it wasn't through synchronizing one or more folders.

Thanks, Robert
metadata: ;category:download-and-install;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/123.0.0.0 Safari/537.36;product:thunderbird
